attributes.action: scrap tolls on M4 and M48 Severn bridge crossings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as they are the only tolls on U.K. motorways, and not advertised as a toll motorway as with the M6 toll road, which was, and is still claimed, as the only toll motorway in Britain

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap tolls on M4 and M48 Severn bridge crossings."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14778.asp

Prime Minister's Office
